author: Hemant Mehta
title: The Story of King David (As Explained By An Atheist Who Actually Read the Bible)
text:
« Author Who Lied About Christopher Hitchens “Contemplating Conversion” Says Atheists Are Immoral About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
